projecten.title: Udemy-Clone
projecten.intro: A clone of the frontpage of Udemy
projecten.text: I set out to replicate Udemy's Landing page. Using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This solo project Improved my skills massively and was completed in just four weeks.

projecten.title: Banky
projecten.text: In a span of three weeks, I created a bank application, during which I deepened my knowledge of JSON and JavaScript. This project was a valuable learning experience in managing financial data and displaying it on the screen.

projecten.title: Colorpicker
projecten.text: Inspired by Colorhunt, my go to color website, I created a color picker using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project enhanced my web development skills and allowed me to explore my artistic side. I completed it in less than one and a half weeks, thanks to valuable learning experiences, all on my own.

projecten.title: Yubtub
projecten.text: I independently crafted a YouTube clone with a Twitch-style interface, starting with local videos and aiming to incorporate real YouTube links. While challenging, this all-JavaScript project was immensely rewarding.

projecten.title: Encrypter
projecten.text: using the Caesar cipher method in JavaScript i created an app for encrypting and decrypting messages

cards.title: HTML
cards.text: Experienced in using html, i use it for most of my projects and make use of semantic code structure.

cards.title: Css
cards.text: Paired with html i make my work standout by using CSS, i always love experimenting and css helps me with that.

cards.title: Scss
cards.text: Ever since i found Scss i never looked back, using scss i can work in a categorized way, making my workflow better.

cards.title: Javascript
cards.text: A site needs to function, my experience in JS helps me make very functional sites, learning it also made my life around frameworks easier.

cards.title: React
cards.text: I started with React, and this portfolio is actually my first big project using it. I like it because it offers a lot of possibilities.

cards.title: Git
cards.text: Experience in using Git for individual and collaborative work

cards.title: After Effects
cards.text: Experience in creating fun little video's in my spare time using AE

cards.title: Adobe XD
cards.text: In the absence of designers, I can step in and create the necessary design using XD
